article_node.title: Cornerstone Building Brands 2024 Corporate Governance and Responsibility Report Showcases Progress in Sustainability, Safety, Innovation and Community Impact
article_node.summary: Cornerstone Building Brands released its 2024 Corporate Governance and Responsibility Report, outlining gains in safety, sustainability, community impact, and innovation. The company achieved a 75.5% waste diversion, exceeded fuel‑efficiency averages, and contributed $4.1 million to affordable housing through its Home for Good program. Safety initiatives such as hand‑safety campaigns and walk‑and‑talks improved year‑over‑year performance. Innovation efforts include a Drive to Premier supplier program and an enterprise‑wide Innovation Council to accelerate sustainable product development. The report underscores the firm’s commitment to responsible growth, ethical standards, and long‑term value for customers and communities.
